author: Lorena Ortega
title: Sin acuerdo en la planta de Amazon de Onda: la plantilla irá a la huelga en pleno 'Black Friday'
text:
CASTELLÓ. Los trabajadores y trabajadoras del centro logístico de Amazon en Onda están llamados a la huelga este viernes y sábado, coincidiendo con el 'Black Friday', una de las fechas de más actividad para el gigante internacional de la distribución. La huelga está convocada desde las 7.00 de la mañana y hasta las 00.00 horas de este viernes 29 de noviembre y el 30 de noviembre y afecta a medio millar de personas que comprenden la plantilla dedicada a tareas de almacén. A unas horas del inicio de la protesta no se ha llegado a ningún acuerdo entre ambas partes.
Tal y como explicaba el presidente del comité de empresa de este centro logístico, Néstor Hernández, la decisión de convocar los paros se aprobó para exigir a Amazon el pago de las gratificaciones por la llamada temporada 'Peak', el pico de trabajo que comprende desde el 'Black Friday' y el periodo de Navidad hasta el día de Reyes. En concreto, solicitan un bono de 490 euros por toda esta temporada y/o un incremento de la mejora voluntaria de 87 euros mensuales.
Desde la representación de los trabajadores y trabajadoras se defiende que la plantilla ha visto deteriorado su nivel adquisitivo. "Llevamos más de año y medio solicitando compensación salarial para paliar la difícil situación económica", indican. Según apuntan, hay empleados que tienen que solicitar anticipos porque no llegan a fin de mes.
Desde Amazon, por su parte, han indicado que los equipos en Onda "trabajan en un entorno moderno y seguro, con salarios y beneficios competitivos". "Las personas trabajadoras perciben salarios por encima de lo establecido en el convenio colectivo provincial del sector logístico, con un salario de entrada de más de 1.483 euros al mes (brutos) y tienen oportunidades para crecer y desarrollar sus carreras profesionales", han apuntado en un comunicado.
Asimismo, han afirmado que "las personas trabajadoras y sus familias disfrutan de amplios beneficios que suponen miles de euros más al año: seguro médico privado, plan de pensiones, permiso parental por nacimiento y cuidado de hijos ampliado y remunerado, seguro de vida, comidas subvencionadas y descuentos, por citar algunos".
El centro logístico de Onda fue inaugurado en julio de 2022 y cuenta con una superficie de almacén de 77.000 metros cuadrados. La planta cuenta con unos 600 trabajadores, unos 500 de ellos dedicados a labores de almacén.

author: Valley City Times-Record
title: Kevin Sorbo’s New Movie ‘THE FIRING SQUAD’ Hits Theaters Nationwide in 2024 | User | times-online.com
text: LOS ANGELES, CA / ACCESSWIRE / December 29, 2023 / LOS ANGELES, CA / ACCESSWIRE / December 29, 2023 / One of the top faith-based film stars in the world - Kevin Sorbo - plays lead Pastor Lynbrook in the highly-anticipated ‘The Firing Squad' film that hits theaters nationwide in August 2024. The film is based on the true story of three Christians who faced execution by firing squad in a third world country. Epoch Times along with Epoch Studios is helping release the film to 2,500 theaters across the U.S. and the world in August 2024. "So happy to finally get to work with Kevin," says Director Tim Chey. "He's been a long-time friend of mine and God really orchestrated Kevin being in the film." Soro has starred ‘God's Not Dead' and ‘Let There Be Light' which were both box office successes. "Kevin is just a stand-up guy for Jesus and America," continues Chey. "He's been blacklisted by many Hollywood companies for his beliefs which is unfortunate." ‘The Firing Squad' also stars Cuba Gooding, Jr., James Barrington, Madeline Anderson, Eric Roberts, Edmund Kwan, et al. At early advanced screenings, the film has brought many to tears and many closer to Christ. "It might be the most evangelical, hard-core Christian film ever made," said a spokesperson for VGC Studios. "All glory and honor to the Lord." ‘The Firing Squad' In Theaters August 2024 About VGC Productions, RiverRain Productions, and Rock Studios RiverRain Productions, VGC Studios, and Rock Studios are one of the top faith-based film studios in the U.S. of over 16 feature films. "THE FIRING SQUAD opens nationwide in theaters in August 2024. author: time news
title: Turkey Arrests 29 People Linked to IS Group Planning Mosque and Synagogue Attacks
text:
2023-12-29 15:11:15
Istanbul- Turkey has arrested 29 people who planned to attack mosques and synagogues, the Interior Ministry said. Interior Minister Ali Yerlikaya said that 29 people suspected of having links with the IS group were detained in nine provinces.
Social media platform Xil Yerlikaya said the suspects caught in Operation Heroes 37 were planning to attack mosques and synagogues in Istanbul.
Apart from them, three senior IS members were also arrested, Turkey’s official Anadolu news agency reported, citing security sources. According to the report, one of the arrested was planning to attack the Iraqi embassy in Ankara. The news agency did not provide any further information about the suspects or their activities.
Turkey has tightened its crackdown on IS and Kurdish activists since a Kurdish militant bombed near government buildings in Ankara on October 1. The arrests come as part of ongoing efforts to combat terrorism and protect the safety and security of the country.
The Interior Ministry has urged the public to remain vigilant and report any suspicious activity to the authorities. The government is committed to preventing any acts of terrorism and ensuring the safety of its citizens and visitors.

author: Redação
title: 'Totalmente indicado': Brasileiros reagem às indicações de 'Ainda Estou Aqui no Oscar'; veja memes
text:
“Você viu Ainda Estou Aqui? Totalmente indicado!” O filme brasileiro dirigido por Walter Salles conquistou três indicações ao Oscar 2025, incluindo uma nomeação histórica na categoria de Melhor Filme, a mais importante da cerimônia.
O filme também concorre nas categorias de Melhor Filme Internacional e na de Melhor Atriz, com uma indicação para Fernanda Torres. E as indicações, claro, foram celebradas nas redes sociais, com muitos memes.
topics: Arts, Culture and Entertainment->online media outlet

author: newsdesk@nottinghampost.com (Cyann Fielding)
title: Ancient beach buried by Mount Vesuvius eruption nearly 2,000 years ago reopens
text: An ancient beach in Italy, previously concealed by the infamous eruption of Mount Vesuvius almost 2,000 years ago, has been unveiled after meticulous restoration efforts. The rejuvenated site within the Archaeological Park of Herculaneum now invites visitors to experience a journey back in time and explore the city that suffered the catastrophic eruption around 79AD. Offering his insightful comment, Italian Culture Minister, Gennaro Sangiuliano, said: "This site has been hugely redeveloped and is becoming a gem. We are within one of the most important archaeological areas in the world with Pompeii, Oplontis and Herculaneum and we are also working a lot in terms of resources. The Archaeological Park of Herculaneum is a great historical memory and the value of history." Over recent decades, the area had been increasingly degraded due to natural factors transforming this beach into somewhat of a marshland. Conveying his vision about the project, Francesco Sirano, Director of the Archaeological Park, stated: "The ancient beach is an extraordinary and unique place in the world. To preserve it for the future, we have reduced the risk of continuous flooding and the dangers to the stability of the excavation fronts and the seafront of the ancient city.", reports [the Mirror](https://www.mirror.co.uk/travel/beach-buried-mount-vesuvius-nearly-33071474). "After three years of intense work aimed at enhancing the ancient beach of the Herculaneum excavations, through the drainage and filling of the area formerly occupied by the beach, visitors are given the opportunity to freely access the entire area and to understand the dynamics that led to the burial of the city," he added. The town of Herculaneum, which lies in the shadow of Mount Vesuvius, was entombed under a three-metre layer of volcanic ash following the infamous eruption. It is believed that over 1,000 people perished as a result. The beach area was first unearthed during the 1980s and 1990s when the skeletons of those who once lived there were discovered amidst the ruins. In 2021, Herculaneum made headlines again with the discovery of the 'last fugitive' - the remains of a man, estimated to be around 40 years old, who appeared to have been fleeing towards the sea with a bag of valuable items. Alongside the 'last fugitive', preserved shrubs, roots, ceiling fragments, boats, and toppled trees were found on the ancient beach. At the moment of the eruption, the scorching cloud would have reached temperatures exceeding 400 and speeds of 80 km/h. Subsequently, the volcanic mud from Vesuvius encapsulated the bodies, preserving them in their final moments.

author: Jean-Hugues Allard
title: Saint-Étienne. « Les SDF souffrent autant de la chaleur que du froid » : les maraudes renforcées en cas de canicule
text:
Saint-Étienne « Les SDF souffrent autant de la chaleur que du froid » : les maraudes renforcées en cas de canicule
Les travailleurs sociaux rallongent leurs tournées pour s’enquérir au mieux de la santé des sans-abri. Exemple avec l’association Renaître à Saint-Étienne, mardi en fin d’après-midi, alors que le mercure avoisine les 36°C.
Dans les sacs à dos de Mathilde et Alexandre, des éléments indispensables en ce moment : des bouteilles d’eau et des casquettes. Le binôme de l’association Renaître est en maraude auprès des SDF et en propose régulièrement. « Même si la plupart sont déjà équipés », précise Alexandre.
Les deux travailleurs sociaux vont travailler un peu plus tard que d’habitude aujourd’hui : 23 heures au lieu de 21 heures. Car les horaires des maraudes ont été étendus avec la canicule. « On renforce notre vigilance à ce...
